i18n.title: React useClickInside Hook
i18n.description: In this lab, we will learn how to create a custom React hook called useClickInside. This hook will handle the event of clicking inside a wrapped component and trigger a callback function. We will use useEffect() and useRef() hooks to append and clean up the click event. By the end of this lab, you will have a better understanding of how to create custom hooks and handle events in React.

meta.title: Create a Powerful React Hook for Click Event Handling
meta.description: Learn how to build a custom React hook called useClickInside to handle click events inside a component.
meta.keywords: custom hook, event handling, react, click event, web development
